patthana11.17:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tiṃsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṃsa.

patthana11.17:41.1: Hetuyā tiṃsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṃsa.
patthana11.17:42.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

patthana11.17:50.1: (Sahajātavārepi paccayavārepi nissayavārepi saṃsaṭṭhavārepi sampayuttavārepi pañhāvārepi vitthāro.)
